node.title: ipblacklist
node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `ipblacklist` ( `ipblacklist_id` int(32) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ipblacklist_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `ipblacklist_ipaddress` char(16) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `ipblacklist_comment` char(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `ipblacklist_timestamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `ipblacklistref_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ipblacklist_id`), UNIQUE KEY `ipblacklist_ipaddress` (`ipblacklist_ipaddress`), KEY `ipblacklist_timestamp` (`ipblacklist_timestamp`), KEY `ipblacklist_timestamp__ipblacklist_id` (`ipblacklist_timestamp`,`ipblacklist_id`), KEY `ipblacklistref_id` (`ipblacklistref_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
